structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Display of plates by commercial vehicles -- Registration to be kept in truck.
law.text: Every motor vehicle licensed under KRS 186.050(3) through (14) shall display all plates issued by the county clerk. Except as provided in KRS 186.045, the registration receipt shall be kept in the truck at all times and shall be available for inspection.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 16. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 25; and ch. 255, sec. 179. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 4. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 9. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739g-32.
